document.title: SSA-971654: Authentication Bypass in 7KT PAC1200 Data Manager from

notes.title: Summary
notes.text:
The latest update for 7KT PAC1200 data manager (7KT1260) from the SENTRON portfolio
fixes a vulnerability that could allow remote attackers to bypass the authentication mechanism
and perform administrative actions under certain conditions.
AFFECTED PRODUCTS
Â· 7KT PAC1200 data manager (7KT1260) from the SENTRON portfolio: All versions <
V2.03
DESCRIPTION
7KT PAC1200 data manager (7KT1260) from the SENTRON portfolio is a fully integrated
smart meter with web interface.
Detailed information about the vulnerability is provided below.
